name: Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 - A game for the whole family!
blurb: This Project is going to create Orbit: Rocket Race 5000. Orbit is a fast paced family game that is packed with enjoyment for many years

rewards.reward:
Pledge reward Level One - $1
A level one supporter receives unique desktop wallpaper from the game Orbit: Rocket Race 5000.  All pledge reward levels will receive this reward.  
•	Unique Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 Desktop Wallpaper.

•	Listed on our website as a Rocket Race Spectator.



*******  Foreign Shipping notice ******
A little Note on shipping to foreign addresses. While we want you to enjoy the game too it can be expensive to ship overseas.  It is for this reason that the cost to ship your items will be based on your location. Pay Pal is accepted for this extra cost.  Please check the rates to your country form the USA. Thank you.

Pledge reward Level Two - $10 
A level two supporter receives a one of a kind promotional card for Orbit: Rocket Race 5000.  This promotional card is only available on kickstarter.com and can be used to replace one of your existing robot cards to make your deck unique.  

•	Orbit alternate art card available only on kickstarter.com.  

•	Unique Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 Desktop Wallpaper.

•	Listed on our website as Rocket Race Pit Crew.

Pledge reward Level Three - $30
One FIRST EDITION copy of Orbit: Rocket Race 5000.  Making you one of the first to show your friends how to race around the galaxy!    If you are looking to buy Orbit this is the place to get it five dollars cheaper than retail plus free US Shipping!
.

•	One First Edition copy of Orbit: Rocket Race 5000.

•	Orbit alternate art card available only on kickstarter.com.  

•	Unique Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 Desktop Wallpaper.

•	Listed on our website as a Rocket Racer!

Pledge reward Level Four - $45, Limited to 500 Pledges.
One FIRST EDITION copy of Orbit: Rocket Race 5000, signed by the 42 Games creative team.  Free US shipping included.

•	One signed First Edition copy of Orbit: Rocket Race 5000.

•	Limited Edition Promotional Card only available on kickstarter.com!  


•	Orbit alternate art card available only on kickstarter.com.  

•	Unique Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 Desktop Wallpaper.

•	Listed on our website as a Pro Rocket Racer!

Pledge reward Level Five - $55, Limited to 250 pledges.
One FIRST EDITION SIGNED copy of Orbit: Rocket Race 5000, signed by the 42 Games creative team.  Free US shipping included.


•	One Signed First Edition copy of Orbit: Rocket Race 5000.


•	Limited Edition high quality challenge coin only available on kickstarter.com.  


•	Limited Edition Promotional Card only available on kickstarter.com!  


•	Orbit alternate art card available only on kickstarter.com. 

•	Unique Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 Desktop Wallpaper.


•	Listed on our website as a Pro Rocket Racer!

Pledge reward level 5.5 Three FIRST EDITION copies of Orbit: Rocket Race
5000. This is a great deal for a small group of gamers.  This Pledge reward was requested 
by educators and small gaming communities!  Gamers and teachers who are looking for a way to
play Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 with multiple groups, this Pledge is for you!
Shipping to one address included. You and two friends / students listed
on our website as Rocket Racers

Pledge reward level 5.5.1 Six FIRST EDITION copies of Orbit: Rocket Race
5000. This is a great deal for a larger group of gamers, resellers and anyone wanting a deal! This Pledge reward was requested by educators, game stores, tournament organizers, meet up groups and small gaming communities!  If you are looking for a way to play Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 with multiple groups, this Pledge is for you!
Shipping to one address included.  No bells and whistles just good gaming family fun at a great price!

Pledge reward Level Six - $150 to Support our troops overseas, Limited to 50 pledges.
42 Games is proud to be able to offer a pledge that will give back to our troops.  By pledging at this level you will receive one FIRST EDITION SIGNED copy of Orbit: Rocket Race 5000. Free US Shipping included.  Six Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 games will be sent to the United States Armed Forces Bases around the world in your honor.  The six games can be designated to one base of your choice.  If no base is chosen we will designate one for you.  Shipping is included to a US APO.  In addition to the above it would be our honor to have you listed on our website as a Captain of the Orbit Race Circuit.  
•	One Signed First Edition copy of Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 for the pledge.

•	Six First Edition copies of Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 to be sent to a US military base of your choice.

•	One Limited Edition high quality challenge coin only available on kickstarter.com.  

•	1 Exclusive Promotional Card for Orbit: Rocket Race 5000.


•	Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 alternate art card available only on kickstarter.com.  

•	Unique Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 Desktop Wallpaper.

•	Listed on our website as a Captain of the Orbit Race Circuit

Pledge award Level Seven- $3,000 the world first official Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 Tournament Game Night, Limited to 1 pledge.
The Pledge winner will be the sponsor a 42 Games Tournament and Game night. Members of The Orbit: Rocket race 5000 creative design team will fly, drive, transport, materialize, and beam to, caravan, balloon, parachute, or whatever it takes to bring the team, the product and the tournament to you!  At your location we will host an Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 tournament.  We will teach the game and some of the games special strategies to you and up to 35 more people at your location.  You provide the venue and any other items you feel is necessary for you and your guests (like - food, drinks, tables, and chairs) comfort. So get tell your favorite game store about us and this reward.  Let them be the first to get this award for their store.  This is going to be epic and an industry first! 

•	We will proctor and judge the game for you. 

•	One SIGNED FIRST EDITION Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 for the pledge.

•	Six FIRST EDITION Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 These are to be used in the tournament and are yours to give to your friends once the tournament ends.

•	36 Orbit alternate art cards available only on kickstarter.com. 


•	36 Limited edition promotional cards only available on kickstarter.com!  

•	36 Limited edition high quality, metal challenge coin only available on kickstarter.com.  

•	The Pledge will be listed on our website as Rocket Race Admiral.

•	The tournament winner will be listed on our website as Pro Rocket Racer!

•	All tournament participants will be listed on our website as Rocket Racers!

The creative team will be on hand for demonstrations, signings and Q/A sessions! There is only one opportunity for this, so get your board game group, friends, favorite store, convention and everyone to pitch in quick! 

* Pledge is responsible for the tournament location and any costs above and beyond the pledge.  

**Available in the continental USA only, subject to approval and availability but we will be flexible. We enjoy teaching and interacting with other gamers.  We want you to experience the first official Orbit: Rocket Race 5000 Tournament.
